text: Anata gata keiten'notami yo, shito-tachi ga chudan sa reta nochi waga shito ga yattekite, anata gata ni taishi (jibutsu no) kaimei o suru. Kore wa anata gata ni,`watashi-tachi ni wa kippo no dentatsu-sha mo keikoku-sha mo konai.' To iwa senai tamedearu. Ima, kippo o tsutae keikoku o ataeru mono ga, masani anata gata no sho ni kita nodearu. Makotoni arra wa subete no koto ni zen'no de ara reru
